00022 /**
00023  * @file   SummaryStats.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  *
00026  * @brief  Utility class for keeping track of summary statistics.
00027  *
00028  */
00029 
00030 #ifndef SUMMARYSTATS_H
00031 #define SUMMARYSTATS_H
00032 
00033 //
00034 #include <cfloat>
00035 #include <cmath>
00036 #include <iostream>
00037 #include <vector>
00038 //
00039 //
00040 
00041 class SummaryStats
00042 {
00043 
00044 public:
00045 
00046   /**
00047    * Add a vector of data, keeping a running tab of the mean, and
00048    * variance statistics. Algorithm from: Donald E. Knuth
00049    * (1998). The Art of Computer Programming, volume 2:
00050    * Seminumerical Algorithms, 3rd edn., p. 232. Boston:
00051    * Addison-Wesley.
00052    *
00053    * @param dat - New vector of data with one data point per chip.
00054    */
00055   void addData(const std::vector<double> &dat);
00056 
00057   void resize(int size);
00058 
00059   double getStdev(int index);
00060 
00061   double getMean(int index);
00062 
00063   void reportIndex(std::ofstream &out, int index);
00064 
00065   void report(std::ofstream &out, const std::string &name);
00066 
00067 private:
00068   std::vector<int> m_Counts; ///< How many examples have been seen.
00069   std::vector<double> m_Means; ///< Running mean calculation.
00070   std::vector<double> m_S; ///< Running variance calculation, divide by (n-1) for actual variance.
00071 };
00072 
00073 #endif /* SUMMARYSTATS_H */
